body_html:
I was looking for this functionality and somehow landed here from Google search.
@aselle unique_with_counts is different from what @yzsatgithub is asking.
In the NP syntax above, he's asking the indicies equivalent to return_index=True attribute in NP.
unique_with_counts in tensorflow is equivalent to return_counts=True attribute in NP.

body:
I was looking for this functionality and somehow landed here from Google search.
@aselle `unique_with_counts` is different from what @yzsatgithub is asking.
In the NP syntax above, he's asking the indicies equivalent to `return_index=True` attribute in NP.
`unique_with_counts` in tensorflow is equivalent to `return_counts=True` attribute in NP.
